title: How To Start Running With Jill Angie
itunes:title: How To Start Running With Jill Angie
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

Today I talk to Jill Angie of Not Your Average Runner. We talked about what most people won't tell you about starting to run when you are losing weight. Why you shouldn't wait, why people will tell you not to run, how to quit thinking you aren't good enough yet, and more.

We both know what it's like to run at all sizes and don't hold anything back. If you want to quit waiting on your weightloss to start living the active life you DESERVE this is the episode for you.

www.notyouraveragerunner.com to find out more information about Jill, her podcast, and more.
